dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Stephen Roller
Kurt Shuster
Angela Fan
Michael Auli
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: Wizard of Wikipedia consists of conversations between two asymmetric agents grounded in passages extracted from Wikipedia. Conversations are grounded in a diverse range of topics (totally 1365). The topics in the test seen subset appear in the training dataset, while the test unseen subset does not.
dcterms:title: Wizard of Wikipedia

dcterms:creator: Kangyan Zhou
Shrimai Prabhumoye
Alan W Black
dcterms:description: CMU DoG contains conversations that are grounded in a part of Wikipedia descriptions or a review of movie provided to the crowd-workers. Different from Wizard of Wikipedia, CMU DoG mainly focuses on the movie domain.
dcterms:title: CMU DoG
